item.title: Not all people are born equal
item.author: Yasser Mahmoud,
item.description: I’m sat across the table from my friend from Gaza; he only got back a week ago but somehow home has managed to find its way back on the news. In between bites of SCR chicken he tells me about his friends back home. I ask if they’re OK and he nods. Suddenly he remembers that one of his friend’s …
